name: Serializable Data Element Containing non-Serializable Item Elements
description:
The software contains a serializable, storable data element such as a field or member,
					but the data element contains member elements that are not
					serializable.
extended_description:
<xhtml:p>This issue can prevent the software from running reliably.  If the relevant code is reachable by an attacker, then this reliability problem might introduce a vulnerability.</xhtml:p>
 	 <xhtml:p>As examples, the serializable nature of a data element comes from a serializable SerializableAttribute attribute in .NET and the inheritance from the java.io.Serializable interface in Java.</xhtml:p>

submission.submission_comment: Entry derived from Common Quality Enumeration (CQE) Draft 0.9.
